source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: How to Paint Water With Watercolors

visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor
visible_instructors.name: Robert

items.headline: Learn To Paint Stunning Waterfalls, Seas, Rough Surf, Quiet Ponds And More...
objectives_summary: You will learn to paint still ponds and reflections
You will learn to paint rough seas and surf
You will learn to paint simple waterfalls

items.title: How to Draw Birds Vol 3 - American Robin, Kingfisher & Duck
items.headline: Learn to Draw 3 stunning Bird Pictures by following Colin's step by step videos. Draw with this easy to learn art medium
objectives_summary: How to use Pastel Pencil Techniques to Draw 3 Different Birds
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Be able to apply the techniques learnt to their own pictures

items.title: How to Lead Children in Beeswax Crayon Drawing
items.headline: Beeswax Crayon Drawing
objectives_summary: Drawing and Child deveopment
How to lead the childen to do the drawing

items.title: Acrylic lesson - Winter evening - Landscape

visible_instructors.title: Ekaterina Fedorova
visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor and Acrylic Artist and Art Tutor
visible_instructors.name: Ekaterina

items.headline: We learn how to paint the Winter evening Landscape step-by-step!
objectives_summary: Discover how you can paint landscape: how to plan layers for it, what parts to paint and in what order, how to go from the general to the specific
Learn acrylic painting techniques: layering, blending, detailing, dry brush, shaped brushes using
Learn acrylic painting basics: values, color mixing, issue fixing

items.title: Acrylic Landscape Painting for beginners Super Easy to paint
items.headline: Learn to paint an easy going cherry blossom landscape using acrylic paint
objectives_summary: How to create a landscape painting using acrylic paint
This course is for beginners, and not only, who want to know more about landscape acrylic painting.
In this class you will learn to paint easily and detailed with acrylic.

items.title: Mastering the science of making realistic hairs
items.headline: Making it easy for anyone to draw and shade a realistic face/Simplified version of drawing/different blending methods
objectives_summary: How to draw hairs
how to draw realistic hairs
various blending methods to use while drawing hairs

items.title: Chapter3/4:  All the Yellow Tea and White Tea in China

visible_instructors.title: Mabol Discover Cha
visible_instructors.job_title: Tea Master, Tea Coach, Pu-erh Tea Specialist, Sommelier
visible_instructors.name: Mabol

items.headline: The Lightly Oxidized Tea for You to Start a Wonderful Tea Journey
objectives_summary: The Origin of Yellow Tea 黄茶的起源
The Processing of Yellow Tea 黄茶的工艺
Yellow 闷黄

items.title: Oil Painting Course for All Levels
items.headline: Paint Your Own Landscape Masterpiece!
objectives_summary: oil painting
watercolor
watercolour

items.title: How to Paint Watercolor Portraits
items.headline: Learn the easy way to create watercolor portraits from any photograph!
objectives_summary: How to sketch and paint 6 different portraits, based on 6 reference photos.
How to use the grid technique to transfer a photo of a portrait onto watercolor paper.
How to quickly draw faces from a reference photograph freehand.

items.title: Botanical Series: Watercolor Lily in Watercolor [Beginners]
items.headline: Paint a simple lily mastering watercolor techniques and prepare for advanced lilies painting
objectives_summary: How to use layernig technique in watercolor
How to choose best color combinations
How to create shadows on petals to achieve realistic feel of a flower

items.title: Watercolour Sketching Essentials: Fun & Easy Landscapes
items.headline: Learn how to drawn and paint twelve different landscape scenes!
objectives_summary: How to quickly improve your drawing and watercolour painting skills.
12 full drawing and painting demonstrations.
How to draw from a reference photo quickly and loosely, how much detail you need to add, and how to imply more details through painting.

items.title: Learn To Stitch Indian Style Kurti (Collar Neck Kurti)

visible_instructors.title: Praseela N
visible_instructors.name: Praseela
visible_instructors.job_title: Entrepreneur, Diploma holder in soaps and cosmetics

items.headline: step by step guide how to stitch collar neck kurti by your own
objectives_summary: By learning this course you can stitch your own kurti in profesional way

items.title: Plum and Snow picture in classical Chinese Painting style

visible_instructors.title: Olga Sumarokova
visible_instructors.job_title: Chinese painting teacher and professional artist
visible_instructors.name: Olga

items.headline: This professional lesson of painting Plum Tree with Snow in classical Chinese brush technique. Create your own picture!
objectives_summary: -Painting Plum petals, buds, branches using Chinese technique
-Improving making tonal balance using the only one type of the brush with ink
-Making confidention wet and dry streaks on rice paper by ink with pure milk!

items.title: Essential Watercolor Painting: Loose Landscapes
items.headline: Learn how to paint 4 different loose landscape subjects!
objectives_summary: Two included drawing lessons at the beginning of two demonstrations to show you how I sketch in basic details. I will show you how to place the horizon line, and quickly and accurately sketch in the reference photo. I will also talk about how I use my sketch to plan out the steps of my watercolor painting afterwards.

How to paint skies, water and mountains in soft and loose manner, using wet-in-wet techniques. I'll talk about how and when to wet your watercolor paper to obtain particular results such as the appearance of soft clouds, and when to paint in more rigid and accurate shapes once the paper has dried.
The importance of timing in watercolors and when to use different brushes.

items.title: Simple Watercolor Streetscapes and Urban Landscapes
items.headline: Learn how to paint and sketch street scenes and buildings in watercolor through 7 demonstrations.
objectives_summary: How to draw from a reference photo quickly and loosely, how much detail you need to add, and how to imply more details through painting.
Learn various watercolour painting techniques such as wet-in-wet, wet-in-dry, drybrush.
How to allow paint to mix on the paper for dramatic and interesting washes.

items.title: Colour Mixing for Absolute Beginner Painters
items.headline: An easy way to learn about mixing colours
objectives_summary: You will learn about the colour wheel
You will learn about primary, secondary and tertiary colours
You will learn terms like shade, tints, warm colours, cool colours, and complementary colours
